servinfo.title: Water Pump Removal and Installation (For J20 Engine Model)

s1.ptxt: Drain coolant referring to Cooling System Draining:For Petrol Engine Model .
Remove water pump and generator drive belt referring to Water Pump and Generator Drive Belt Removal and Installation (For J20 Engine):For Petrol Engine Model .
Remove thermostat referring to Thermostat Removal and Installation (For J20 Engine Model):For Petrol Engine Model .
Disconnect heater pipe (2) from water pump (1).
Remove water pump (1) from cylinder block (3).

servinfosub.title: Installation

ptxt.intxrefpoff: Water Pump Inspection:For Petrol Engine Model

servinfosub.ptxt: Reverse removal procedure for installation noting the following points.

item.ptxt: Install water pump assembly to cylinder block and tighten bolts to specified torque.
Refill cooling system referring to Step 7) to 17) of Cooling System Flush and Refill:For Petrol Engine Model .
Verify that there is no coolant leakage at each connection.
